fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Trade, Competition, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Single market, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Food Safety, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Automotive policies (eCall, Weighs and dimensions of trucks, standards, CO2 emission limits, Fuel Quality Directive), Smart Cities and Communities (EIP SCC Market Place and Action Clusters), Energy Policies (Implementation of Third Energy Package, Smart Grid Task Force, Energy Union strategy, Energy efficiency in buildings), Environmental Policies (Circular Economy, Eco-Label), Digital Agenda (Digital Single Market Strategy, Industry 4.0), Product safety
goals__remit: Monitoring  EU policies and regulations and reporting them to Japanese private companies and governmental organizations.
